articles.title: WGA Response to Studios Indicates No Quick End to Strike - Variety
articles.description: The Writers Guild of America responded Tuesday to the latest proposal from the Alliance of Motion Picture and Television Producers, but any hopes for an easy resolution of the 106-day strike were q…
